item.title: CloudLogic
item.description: CloudLogic is the “Cloud” based version of a Dealer Solutions application called DealerLogic. (Read more here). DealerLogic is setup by installing a “server” version of the application locally on a dealer’s network and then users login using a local version of DealerLogic on each desktop. IT do not support DealerLogic, it is handled by the respective developers. CloudLogic makes use of a simple Remote Desktop Services application, which allows a dealer’s DealerLogic app to be installed on one of two AWS servers run in the Dealer Solutions’ legacy AWS account.
